note: Depending on the country and year, the data relates to income (measured after taxes and benefits) or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita). Income and consumption estimates are available separately in this [Data Explorer](https://ourworldindata.org/explorers/inequality-wb).
title: Income or consumption share of the richest 10%
subtitle: The share of after tax income or consumption received by the richest 10% of the population.
